type.name: T:Elysium.Controls.Automation.CommandButtonBaseAutomationPeer
type.summary: It is a base class for providers of successors of the class for UI Automation technology.

method.name: M:Elysium.Controls.Automation.CommandButtonBaseAutomationPeer.#ctor(Elysium.Controls.Primitives.CommandButtonBase)
method.summary: Creates a new instance of the class .
method.param: An instance of the class , for which the provider will be used.

property.name: P:Elysium.Controls.Automation.CommandButtonBaseAutomationPeer.Owner
property.summary: An instance of the successor of the class , for which the provider will be used.
property.value: An instance of the successor of the class , for which the provider will be used.

method.name: M:Elysium.Controls.Automation.CommandButtonBaseAutomationPeer.GetAutomationControlTypeCore
method.summary: Returns a type of the control for the object-successor of the class , which is connected with current object . This method is called by .
method.ensures: The being returned value is a value of AutomationControlType.Button .
